2025-12-28.title: Trust in the Lord â€” 2025-12-28
2025-12-28.content:
Trust in the LORD with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding.
In all your ways submit to him, and he will make your paths straight.

2025-12-29.title: Special 2025 Devotion
2025-12-29.content: The LORD is my shepherd; I shall not want.
